parameters.User: User whose avatar will be sent
parameters.Secret: Make the message ephemeral (only you can see it)

picture.explanation: Sends a random picture of a animal of your choosing

parameters.Secret: Make the message ephemeral (only you can see it)

define.explanation: Find the definition for a word in a selected dictionary

parameters.Source: Source page to look the word up in
parameters.Secret: Make the message ephemeral (only you can see it)

emoji.explanation: Command that allows you to send nitro emoji without nitro

parameters.Emoji name: Name of the emoji to be registered (must include colons at the beginning and end)
